definition: two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)

sentences.english: The bonus pay for this month is almost twice that of the basic salary .
sentences.chinese: 這個月效益工資都快是基本工資的兩倍了。

sentences.english: This is the new conveyor belt we had installed last year. We doubled our output in this department as result.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們剛安裝的輸送帶，使我們的產量提高了兩倍。

sentences.english: However, their cutters can be twice as expensive as the Easy Cutter.
sentences.chinese: 然而，它們的切割器的價格是“易剪”的兩倍。

sentences.english: Cover, and let rise until doubled in size, about 45 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 蓋上溼布進行基本發酵至麪糰兩倍大，大約45分鐘。

sentences.english: This river is two times longer than that one.
sentences.chinese: 這條河比那條河長兩倍。

sentences.english: Many top athletes can consume up to twice what a normal preson would eat.
sentences.chinese: 許多頂尖運動員消耗掉的食物是正常所喫食物的兩倍。

sentences.english: Nylon is nearly twice as strong as natural silk.
sentences.chinese: 尼龍的強度幾乎是天然絲的兩倍。

sentences.english: Older patients are twice as likely to be diagnosed with thyroid cancer as younger patients.
sentences.chinese: 老年患者被診斷爲甲狀腺癌的風險是年輕患者的兩倍。

sentences.english: They double-team on one section of my army.
sentences.chinese: 他們用兩倍兵力對付我的一支軍隊。

sentences.english: The workforce has tripled in size since the new factory opened.
sentences.chinese: 自新工廠一業以來職工人數已增加了兩倍。

sentences.english: But because of a current glut in the market, the average rate of depreciation has nearly doubled.
sentences.chinese: 但是按照現在的市場行情，平均折舊率是以前的兩倍。

sentences.english: I am a foot taller than Napoleon and twice of the weight of Twiggy;
sentences.chinese: 我比拿破崙高一英尺，體重是特威格的兩倍。

sentences.english: Thailand exports almost twice the amount of rice as India, its nearest rival.
sentences.chinese: 泰國出口的大米接近其最近的競爭對手印度的兩倍。

sentences.english: The "Phase Two" plan will nearly double the size of the mall.
sentences.chinese: 這個“二期”規劃規模是當前商業街的兩倍。

sentences.english: Twice after buying Simmons, THL borrowed more.
sentences.chinese: THL收購了席夢思牀品公司後又借了兩倍多的款。

sentences.english: The production of hardware has been increased over three times.
sentences.chinese: 五金製品的產量增長了兩倍多。

definition: Gundam, Japanese animation franchise/Jean-Luc Godard (1930-), French-Swiss film director
to compare/to dispute/compared to/(before adj.) relatively/comparatively/rather/also pr. [jiao3]
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
